channel.title: Npc Spawning?
channel.description:
[u][b]Hello.[/b][/u]
I am at the moment, making a quest. And this is my second one, i have one problem. The quest involves killing an npc, and the npc only spawns for one part of the quest, so at the moment i have this..
[code] if (qStage[1] == 2) { server.npcHandler.newNPC(269, 3065, 3262, 0, 0, 0, 0,0, 0, 150); } [/code]
But the problem is, this spawns loads of them if you are on stage 2 of the quest. Basically, i need something which will check if theres already an npc..like this;
[code] if ((NPC == 269) && (isonX == XCOORD) && (isonY == YCOORD)) { [/code]
^ something like that anyway. Any help please?
[b]Thanks.[/b]

item.title: Npc Spawning?
item.dc:creator: @WRX WRX`
item.description:
@WRX wrote:

I’m guessing summoncount is how many NPCS there are on the spot?

Edit: Wanna give me ya summoncount method then? Lol.

Read full topic

item.title: Npc Spawning?
item.dc:creator: @slomifier slomifier
item.description:
@slomifier wrote:

What I did is after the spawn code, it added a counter, and added 1 to it, than made it so it only spawns if the counter is at 0. Like:

if(summoncount == 0 && QUEST STAGE VARIABLE == true){ server.npcHandler.newNPC(2745, 2975, 3342, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 1000, false); summoncount += 1; }

Read full topic

item.title: Npc Spawning?
item.dc:creator: @WRX WRX`
item.description:
@WRX wrote:

Hello.

I am at the moment, making a quest. And this is my second one, i have one problem.
The quest involves killing an npc, and the npc only spawns for one part of the quest, so at the moment i have this…

if (qStage[1] == 2) {
server.npcHandler.newNPC(269, 3065, 3262, 0, 0,
			0, 0,0, 0, 150);
}

But the problem is, this spawns loads of them if you are on stage 2 of the quest.
Basically, i need something which will check if theres already an npc…like this;

if ((NPC == 269) && (isonX == XCOORD) && (isonY == YCOORD)) {

^ something like that anyway.
Any help please?

Thanks.

Read full topic
